name: Courier: Cargo Simulation
description:
You are working for a courier company, however, there is a problem with the company's delivery systems and it's your duty to set orders right!

Button configuration

Press "Q" to send the shipment to address 1

Press "W" to send the shipment to address 2

Press "E" to send the shipment to address 3

Press "R" to send the shipment to address 4

(Graphics belong to me. The game is coded in 24 hours)
